00043 // convenient local macros to record errors for debugging
00044 #define SAVE_ERR(_code_, _msg_) \
00045   do { \
00046     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex); \
00047     m_last_errors.push_back(HT_EXCEPTION(_code_, _msg_)); \
00048     while (m_last_errors.size() > MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH) \
00049       m_last_errors.pop_front(); \
00050   } while (false)
00051 
00052 #define SAVE_ERR2(_code_, _ex_, _msg_) \
00053   do { \
00054     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex); \
00055     m_last_errors.push_back(HT_EXCEPTION2(_code_, _ex_, _msg_)); \
00056     while (m_last_errors.size() > MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH) \
00057       m_last_errors.pop_front(); \
00058   } while (false)
00059 
00060 using namespace Hypertable;
00061 
00062 namespace {
00063   const uint32_t METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT = 10;
00064   const uint32_t MAX_ERROR_QUEUE_LENGTH = 4;
00065   const uint32_t METADATA_RETRY_INTERVAL = 30000;
00066   const uint32_t ROOT_METADATA_RETRY_INTERVAL = 3000;
00067 
00068   class MetaKeyBuilder {
00069   public:
00070     MetaKeyBuilder() : start(0), end(0) { return; }
00071     void
00072     build_keys(const char *format, uint32_t table_id, const char *row_key) {
00073       char *ptr;
00074       if (row_key) {
00075         start = new char [16 + strlen(row_key) + 1];
00076         sprintf(start, format, table_id);
00077         strcat(start, row_key);
00078       }
00079       else {
00080         start = new char [16];
00081         sprintf(start, format, table_id);
00082       }
00083       end = new char [16];
00084       sprintf(end, format, table_id);
00085       ptr = end + strlen(end);
00086       *ptr++ = (char)0xff;
00087       *ptr++ = (char)0xff;
00088       *ptr = 0;
00089     }
00090     ~MetaKeyBuilder() {
00091       delete [] start;
00092       delete [] end;
00093     }
00094     char *start;
00095     char *end;
00096   };
00097 }

00100 RangeLocator::RangeLocator(PropertiesPtr &cfg, ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr,
00101     Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace, uint32_t timeout_ms)
00102   : m_conn_manager(conn_mgr), m_hyperspace(hyperspace),
00103     m_root_stale(true), m_range_server(conn_mgr->get_comm(), timeout_ms) {
00104 
00105   Timer timer(timeout_ms, true);
00106   int cache_size = cfg->get_i64("Hypertable.LocationCache.MaxEntries");
00107 
00108   m_cache = new LocationCache(cache_size);
00109 
00110   initialize(timer);
00111 }

00114 void RangeLocator::initialize(Timer &timer) {
00115   DynamicBuffer valbuf(0);
00116   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00117   uint64_t handle;
00118 
00119   m_root_handler = new RootFileHandler(this);
00120 
00121   m_root_file_handle = m_hyperspace->open("/hypertable/root",
00122                                           OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_root_handler);
00123 
00124   while (true) {
00125     try {
00126       handle = m_hyperspace->open("/hypertable/tables/METADATA",
00127                                   OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback);
00128       break;
00129     }
00130     catch (Exception &e) {
00131       if (timer.expired())
00132         HT_THROW2(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND, e,
00133                   "/hypertable/tables/METADATA");
00134       poll(0, 0, 3000);
00135     }
00136   }
00137 
00138   m_hyperspace->attr_get(handle, "schema", valbuf);
00139 
00140   m_hyperspace->close(handle);
00141 
00142   SchemaPtr schema = Schema::new_instance((char *)valbuf.base, valbuf.fill(),
00143                                           true);
00144   if (!schema->is_valid()) {
00145     HT_ERRORF("Schema Parse Error for table METADATA : %s",
00146               schema->get_error_string());
00147     HT_THROW_(Error::RANGESERVER_SCHEMA_PARSE_ERROR);
00148   }
00149 
00150   m_metadata_schema = schema;
00151 
00152   m_metadata_table.name = "METADATA";
00153   m_metadata_table.id = 0;
00154   m_metadata_table.generation = schema->get_generation();
00155 
00156   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00157 
00158   if ((cf = schema->get_column_family("StartRow")) == 0) {
00159     HT_ERROR("Unable to find column family 'StartRow' in METADATA schema");
00160     HT_THROW_(Error::BAD_SCHEMA);
00161   }
00162   m_startrow_cid = cf->id;
00163 
00164   if ((cf = schema->get_column_family("Location")) == 0) {
00165     HT_ERROR("Unable to find column family 'Location' in METADATA schema");
00166     HT_THROW_(Error::BAD_SCHEMA);
00167   }
00168   m_location_cid = cf->id;
00169 }

00172 RangeLocator::~RangeLocator() {
00173   m_hyperspace->close(m_root_file_handle);
00174 }

00176 
00177 void
00178 RangeLocator::find_loop(const TableIdentifier *table, const char *row_key,
00179     RangeLocationInfo *rane_loc_infop, Timer &timer, bool hard) {
00180   int error;
00181   uint32_t wait_time = 1000;
00182   uint32_t total_wait_time = 0;
00183 
00184   error = find(table, row_key, rane_loc_infop, timer, hard);
00185 
00186   if (error == Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND) {
00187     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00188     clear_error_history();
00189     HT_THROWF(error, "Table '%s' is (being) dropped", table->name);
00190   }
00191 
00192   while (error != Error::OK) {
00193 
00194     // check for timer expiration
00195     if (timer.remaining() < wait_time) {
00196       dump_error_history();
00197       HT_THROWF(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT, "Locating range for row='%s'", row_key);
00198     }
00199 
00200     // wait a bit
00201     poll(0, 0, (int)wait_time);
00202     total_wait_time += wait_time;
00203     wait_time = (wait_time * 3) / 2;
00204 
00205     // try again
00206     if ((error = find(table, row_key, rane_loc_infop, timer, true))
00207         == Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND) {
00208       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00209       clear_error_history();
00210       HT_THROWF(error, "Table '%s' is (being) dropped", table->name);
00211     }
00212   }
00213 
00214   clear_error_history();
00215 }

00217 
00218 int
00219 RangeLocator::find(const TableIdentifier *table, const char *row_key,
00220     RangeLocationInfo *rane_loc_infop, Timer &timer, bool hard) {
00221   RangeSpec range;
00222   ScanSpec meta_scan_spec;
00223   ScanBlock scan_block;
00224   int error;
00225   Key key;
00226   RangeLocationInfo range_loc_info;
00227   String start_row;
00228   String end_row;
00229   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00230   RowInterval ri;
00231   bool inclusive = (row_key == 0 || *row_key == 0) ? true : false;
00232 
00233   if (m_root_stale) {
00234     if ((error = read_root_location(timer)) != Error::OK)
00235       return error;
00236   }
00237 
00238   if (!hard && m_cache->lookup(table->id, row_key, rane_loc_infop))
00239     return Error::OK;
00240 
00244   if (table->id == 0 && (row_key == 0
00245       || strcmp(row_key, Key::END_ROOT_ROW) < 0)) {
00246     rane_loc_infop->start_row = "";
00247     rane_loc_infop->end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00248     rane_loc_infop->location = m_root_range_info.location;
00249     return Error::OK;
00250   }
00251 
00254   range.start_row = 0;
00255   range.end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00256   memcpy(&addr, &m_root_addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00257 
00258   MetaKeyBuilder meta_keys;
00259   char *meta_key;
00260 
00261   if (table->id == 0)
00262     meta_keys.build_keys("%d:", 0, row_key);
00263   else
00264     meta_keys.build_keys("0:%d:", table->id, row_key);
00265 
00269   meta_key = meta_keys.start+2;
00270   if (hard ||
00271       !m_cache->lookup(0, meta_key, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00272 
00273     meta_scan_spec.row_limit = METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT;
00274     meta_scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00275     meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("StartRow");
00276     meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00277 
00278     ri.start = meta_keys.start;
00279     ri.start_inclusive = true;
00280     ri.end = 0;
00281     ri.end_inclusive = false;
00282     meta_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00283 
00284     meta_scan_spec.return_deletes = false;
00285     // meta_scan_spec.interval = ????;
00286 
00287     try {
00288       m_range_server.set_timeout(timer.remaining());
00289       m_range_server.create_scanner(addr, m_metadata_table, range,
00290                                     meta_scan_spec, scan_block);
00291     }
00292     catch (Exception &e) {
00293       if (e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND)
00294         m_cache->invalidate(0, meta_keys.start);
00295       SAVE_ERR2(e.code(), e, format("Problem creating scanner for start row "
00296                 "'%s' on METADATA[..??]", meta_keys.start));
00297       return e.code();
00298     }
00299 
00300     if ((error = process_metadata_scanblock(scan_block)) != Error::OK) {
00301       m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00302       return error;
00303     }
00304 
00305     if (!scan_block.eos()) {
00306       m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00307     }
00308 
00309     if (!m_cache->lookup(0, meta_key, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00310       String err_msg = format("Unable to find metadata for row '%s' row_key=%s",
00311                               meta_keys.start, row_key);
00312       HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00313       SAVE_ERR(Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND, err_msg);
00314       return Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND;
00315     }
00316   }
00317 
00318   if (table->id == 0)
00319     return Error::OK;
00320 
00325   range.start_row = rane_loc_infop->start_row.c_str();
00326   range.end_row   = rane_loc_infop->end_row.c_str();
00327 
00328   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00329       rane_loc_infop->location.c_str(), addr)) {
00330     String err_msg = format("Invalid location found in METADATA entry for row "
00331         "'%s' - %s", start_row.c_str(), rane_loc_infop->location.c_str());
00332     HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00333     SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, err_msg);
00334     return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00335   }
00336 
00337   meta_scan_spec.clear();
00338 
00339   meta_scan_spec.row_limit = METADATA_READAHEAD_COUNT;
00340   meta_scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00341   meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("StartRow");
00342   meta_scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00343 
00344   ri.start = meta_keys.start+2;
00345   ri.start_inclusive = true;
00346   ri.end = meta_keys.end+2;;
00347   ri.end_inclusive = true;
00348   meta_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00349 
00350   // meta_scan_spec.interval = ????;
00351 
00352   if (m_conn_manager &&
00353       !m_conn_manager->wait_for_connection(addr, timer.remaining())) {
00354     if (timer.expired())
00355       HT_THROW_(Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT);
00356   }
00357 
00358   try {
00359     m_range_server.set_timeout(timer.remaining());
00360     m_range_server.create_scanner(addr, m_metadata_table, range,
00361                                   meta_scan_spec, scan_block);
00362   }
00363   catch (Exception &e) {
00364     if (e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND)
00365       m_cache->invalidate(0, meta_keys.start+2);
00366     SAVE_ERR2(e.code(), e, format("Problem creating scanner on second-level "
00367               "METADATA (start row = %s)", ri.start));
00368     return e.code();
00369   }
00370 
00371   if ((error = process_metadata_scanblock(scan_block)) != Error::OK) {
00372     m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00373     return error;
00374   }
00375 
00376   if (!scan_block.eos()) {
00377     m_range_server.destroy_scanner(addr, scan_block.get_scanner_id(), 0);
00378   }
00379 
00380   if (row_key == 0)
00381     row_key = "";
00382 
00383   if (!m_cache->lookup(table->id, row_key, rane_loc_infop, inclusive)) {
00384     SAVE_ERR(Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND, (String)"RangeLocator failed to find "
00385              "metadata for table '" + table->name + "' row '" + row_key + "'");
00386     return Error::METADATA_NOT_FOUND;
00387   }
00388 
00389   return Error::OK;
00390 }
00391 
00392 
00393 int RangeLocator::process_metadata_scanblock(ScanBlock &scan_block) {
00394   RangeLocationInfo range_loc_info;
00395   SerializedKey serkey;
00396   ByteString value;
00397   Key key;
00398   const char *stripped_key;
00399   uint32_t table_id = 0;
00400   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00401 
00402   range_loc_info.start_row = "";
00403   range_loc_info.end_row = "";
00404   range_loc_info.location = "";
00405 
00406   bool got_start_row = false;
00407   bool got_end_row = false;
00408   bool got_location = false;
00409 
00410   while (scan_block.next(serkey, value)) {
00411 
00412     if (!key.load(serkey)) {
00413       String err_msg = format("METADATA lookup for '%s' returned bad key",
00414                               serkey.str() + 1);
00415       HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00416       SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, err_msg);
00417       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00418     }
00419 
00420     if ((stripped_key = strchr(key.row, ':')) == 0) {
00421       String err_msg = format("Bad row key found in METADATA - '%s'", key.row);
00422       HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00423       SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, err_msg);
00424       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00425     }
00426     stripped_key++;
00427 
00428     if (got_end_row) {
00429       if (strcmp(stripped_key, range_loc_info.end_row.c_str())) {
00430         if (got_start_row && got_location) {
00431 
00435           if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00436               range_loc_info.location.c_str(), addr)) {
00437             String err_msg = format("Invalid location found in METADATA entry "
00438                 "for row '%s' - %s", range_loc_info.end_row.c_str(),
00439                 range_loc_info.location.c_str());
00440             SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, err_msg);
00441             HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00442             return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00443           }
00444           if (m_conn_manager)
00445             m_conn_manager->add(addr, METADATA_RETRY_INTERVAL, "RangeServer");
00446 
00447           m_cache->insert(table_id, range_loc_info);
00448           /*
00449           HT_DEBUG_OUT << "(1) cache insert table=" << table_id << " start="
00450               << range_loc_info.start_row << " end=" << range_loc_info.end_row
00451               << " loc=" << range_loc_info.location << HT_END;
00452           */
00453         }
00454         else {
00455           SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, format("Incomplete METADATA record "
00456                    "found under row key '%s' (got_location=%s)", range_loc_info
00457                    .end_row.c_str(), got_location ? "true" : "false"));
00458         }
00459         range_loc_info.start_row = "";
00460         range_loc_info.end_row = "";
00461         range_loc_info.location = "";
00462         got_start_row = false;
00463         got_end_row = false;
00464         got_location = false;
00465       }
00466     }
00467     else {
00468       table_id = (uint32_t)strtol(key.row, 0, 10);
00469       range_loc_info.end_row = stripped_key;
00470       got_end_row = true;
00471     }
00472 
00473     if (key.column_family_code == m_startrow_cid) {
00474       const uint8_t *str;
00475       size_t len = value.decode_length(&str);
00476       //cout << "TS=" << key.timestamp << endl;
00477       range_loc_info.start_row = String((const char *)str, len);
00478       got_start_row = true;
00479     }
00480     else if (key.column_family_code == m_location_cid) {
00481       const uint8_t *str;
00482       size_t len = value.decode_length(&str);
00483       range_loc_info.location = String((const char *)str, len);
00484       if (range_loc_info.location == "!")
00485         return Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND;
00486       got_location = true;
00487     }
00488     else {
00489       HT_ERRORF("METADATA lookup on row '%s' returned incorrect column (id=%d)",
00490                 serkey.row(), key.column_family_code);
00491     }
00492   }
00493 
00494   if (got_start_row && got_end_row && got_location) {
00495 
00499     if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(
00500         range_loc_info.location.c_str(), addr)) {
00501       String err_msg = format("Invalid location found in METADATA entry for "
00502           "row '%s' - %s", range_loc_info.end_row.c_str(),
00503           range_loc_info.location.c_str());
00504       SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, err_msg);
00505       HT_ERRORF("%s", err_msg.c_str());
00506       return Error::INVALID_METADATA;
00507     }
00508     if (m_conn_manager)
00509       m_conn_manager->add(addr, METADATA_RETRY_INTERVAL, "RangeServer");
00510 
00511     m_cache->insert(table_id, range_loc_info);
00512 
00513     /*
00514     HT_DEBUG_OUT << "(2) cache insert table=" << table_id << " start="
00515         << range_loc_info.start_row << " end=" << range_loc_info.end_row
00516         << " loc=" << range_loc_info.location << HT_END;
00517     */
00518   }
00519   else if (got_end_row) {
00520     SAVE_ERR(Error::INVALID_METADATA, format("Incomplete METADATA record found "
00521              "under row key '%s' (got_location=%s)", range_loc_info
00522              .end_row.c_str(), got_location ? "true" : "false"));
00523   }
00524 
00525   return Error::OK;
00526 }
00527 
00528 
00529 int RangeLocator::read_root_location(Timer &timer) {
00530   DynamicBuffer value(0);
00531   String addr_str;
00532 
00533   m_hyperspace->attr_get(m_root_file_handle, "Location", value);
00534 
00535   m_root_range_info.start_row  = "";
00536   m_root_range_info.end_row    = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00537   m_root_range_info.location   = (const char *)value.base;
00538 
00539   m_cache->insert(0, m_root_range_info, true);
00540 
00541   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr((const char *)value.base, m_root_addr)) {
00542     HT_ERROR("Bad format of 'Location' attribute of "
00543              "/hypertable/root Hyperspace file");
00544     SAVE_ERR(Error::BAD_ROOT_LOCATION, "Bad format of 'Location' attribute"
00545                   " of /hypertable/root Hyperspace file");
00546     return Error::BAD_ROOT_LOCATION;
00547   }
00548 
00549   if (m_conn_manager) {
00550     uint32_t after_remaining, remaining = timer.remaining();
00551 
00552     m_conn_manager->add(m_root_addr, ROOT_METADATA_RETRY_INTERVAL,
00553                         "Root RangeServer");
00554 
00555     if (!m_conn_manager->wait_for_connection(m_root_addr, remaining)) {
00556       after_remaining = timer.remaining();
00557       HT_ERRORF("Timeout (%u millis) waiting for root RangeServer connection "
00558                 "- %s", remaining - after_remaining,
00559                 m_root_addr.format().c_str());
00560       return Error::REQUEST_TIMEOUT;
00561     }
00562   }
00563 
00564   m_root_stale = false;
00565 
00566   return Error::OK;
00567 }
